channel.title: Steam version freezes on loading screen
channel.description: When I open Black Mesa it just freezes and wont load, It shows the "interactive" loading screen but its blurred and shows the loading thing in the bottom right corner.

item.title: Steam version freezes on loading screen
item.dc:creator: Morolian
item.description:
When I open Black Mesa it just freezes and wont load,
It shows the “interactive” loading screen but its blurred and shows the loading thing in the bottom right corner.

Read full topic
item.source: Steam version freezes on loading screen
